name: Sea Breeze Perfume
description: This ocean breeze perfume captures the essence of the sea. Its light and airy fragrance is perfect for summer days. Stay fresh and revitalized with every spray.

name: Sage Citrus Perfume
description: This fresh citrus perfume offers a vibrant and refreshing scent. Perfect for daily use, it keeps you smelling fresh all day. A must-have for any modern man.

name: Woody Musk Perfume
description: This woody musk perfume provides a deep and rich fragrance. With notes of cedarwood and musk, it’s ideal for evening wear. Exude confidence with this bold scent.

name: Black Cufflinks
description: These sleek silver cufflinks add a touch of elegance to formal wear. Their minimalist design ensures they complement any suit. Perfect for business meetings or formal events.

name: Blue-Plated Cufflinks
description: These gold-plated cufflinks offer a luxurious finish to any formal outfit. Crafted with precision, they ensure a standout look. A great addition to your accessory collection.

name: Sunglasses
description: These sunglasses combine style and protection in one. Their sleek design complements any casual or formal look. A must-have accessory for sunny days.

name: Woolen Scarf
description: This cozy woolen scarf keeps you warm and stylish. Its soft texture makes it a comfortable accessory for cold days. A must-have for winter wardrobes.

name: Casual Loafers
description: These casual loafers are perfect for everyday wear. Their slip-on design ensures easy wear while maintaining a sleek, modern look. Comfortable and stylish for both work and weekends.

name: Suede Desert Boots
description: These suede desert boots offer a rugged yet stylish look. With a comfortable fit and durable design, they’re ideal for outdoor adventures. A versatile choice for casual wear.

name: Classic Brogue Shoes
description: These classic brogue shoes add a touch of sophistication to any outfit. The intricate detailing and high-quality leather ensure a polished look. Perfect for both formal and semi-formal occasions.

name: Traditional Leather Chappal
description: This traditional leather chappal combines comfort with cultural style. Handcrafted with soft leather, it’s perfect for casual gatherings. A must-have for those who appreciate heritage fashion.

name: Peshawari Chappal
description: The iconic Peshawari chappal offers a blend of tradition and comfort. Made with durable leather, it’s perfect for daily wear. A stylish choice for casual and traditional outfits.

name: Sporty Sneakers
description: These sporty sneakers offer a blend of comfort and athletic style. Designed for daily wear, they provide excellent cushioning and support. Perfect for casual outings or light workouts.

description: These comfort sandals offer all-day wearability with a casual look. The soft sole and adjustable straps provide a customized fit. Ideal for beach outings or casual summer days.

description: The traditional Kolhapuri chappal is a blend of heritage and craftsmanship. Made with genuine leather, it offers both comfort and style. A perfect addition to ethnic wear.

description: This slim fit pent shirt provides a sharp, tailored look. It’s crafted from a stretchable fabric for a snug yet comfortable fit. Great for casual hangouts or even semi-formal events.

description: This lightweight cotton pent shirt is your go-to summer essential. It keeps you cool and comfortable throughout the day. Perfect for beach days or casual weekend outings.
